text: Dhan Bahadur Buda is a Nepalese politician, cultural minister, and Member of the House of Representatives (Nepal) elected from Dolpa-1, Province No. 6. In the Second Oli Cabinet, he was State Minister for Culture, Tourism, and Civil Aviation. He belongs to the CPN (Unified Socialist). ==References== Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Dhan Bahadur Buda
